attributes.action: permit the Road Fund Licence (Road Tax) to be paid by Direct Debit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the cost of the Road Fund Licence (Road Tax) increasing more each year, it can sometimes be difficult to afford the full cost in one go.

If the Road Fund Licence (Road Tax) is to continue, it would seem sensible that there is an option to pay by Direct Debit to spread the cost to the already heavily taxed motorist.
